name: MagPie
author: geegood.com/wordpress

sections.description:
MagPie allows you to import products from CSV file and image. You have your products in a spreadsheet or database and want to be able to export a CSV file and import your products automatically into WP e-Commerce. MagPie is for you.

Using it

Please go here for now for documentation: http://geegood.com/wordpress/
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip to your plugin folder.
  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins section of your dashboard.
sections.changelog:
3.0

  • Please visit http://geegood.com/wordpress/

1.1

  • Please visit http://geegood.com/wordpress/

1.0

  • First commercial release. Can import CSV file and image.

short_description: MagPie allows you to import products from/to CSV file and image for WP e-Commerce.
description:
MagPie allows you to import products from CSV file and image. You have your products in a spreadsheet or database and want to be able to export a CSV file and import your products automatically into WP e-Commerce. MagPie is for you.

Using it

upgrade_notice.1.1: Install. You can have old and new WeCPi running next to each other.
